## Scope

New York city provides 311 Complaint data via their NYC OpenData website ( https://nycopendata.socrata.com/).  

The base dataset is the _311 Service Requests from 2010 to Present_ filtered to include only records with the complaint _Animal Abuse_.  The URL for this data is 
https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Social-Services/311-Service-Requests-from-2010-to-Present/erm2-nwe9. The dataset includes complaints through October 31, 2015.


## Design

The application needs four tabs: Plot, Summary, Table, and Map.
